664c54f9-d97d-410b-a479-23dd8a08a628.name: Better Tab Indicators
664c54f9-d97d-410b-a479-23dd8a08a628.description: This Zen Theme provides some alternative styling for the tabs on the sidebar.
664c54f9-d97d-410b-a479-23dd8a08a628.author: TheRealMG

f7c71d9a-bce2-420f-ae44-a64bd92975ab.name: Better Unloaded Tabs
f7c71d9a-bce2-420f-ae44-a64bd92975ab.description: Makes unloaded tabs easier to notice by making them greyscale and transparent.
f7c71d9a-bce2-420f-ae44-a64bd92975ab.author: Felkazz

1e86cf37-a127-4f24-b919-d265b5ce29a0.name: Cleaner Extension Menu
1e86cf37-a127-4f24-b919-d265b5ce29a0.description: Remove header and reduce width of the Unified Extension Menu in Zen
1e86cf37-a127-4f24-b919-d265b5ce29a0.author: KiKaraage

253a3a74-0cc4-47b7-8b82-996a64f030d5.name: Floating History
253a3a74-0cc4-47b7-8b82-996a64f030d5.description: Detaches and moves a redesgined history sidebar to the left so that it appears to float and matches the zen aesthetic.
253a3a74-0cc4-47b7-8b82-996a64f030d5.author: ahmaadaziz

906c6915-5677-48ff-9bfc-096a02a72379.name: Floating Status Bar
906c6915-5677-48ff-9bfc-096a02a72379.description: Mod for Zen Browser that detaches the status bar from the bottom left corner of the browser window.
906c6915-5677-48ff-9bfc-096a02a72379.author: AmirhBeigi

83a641f7-eca9-4c0f-91af-45627bef0539.name: Floating URLbar
83a641f7-eca9-4c0f-91af-45627bef0539.description: Levitate the URL bar when focusing on it, with a blurred background.
83a641f7-eca9-4c0f-91af-45627bef0539.author: mauro-balades

58649066-2b6f-4a5b-af6d-c3d21d16fc00.name: Private Mode Highlighting
58649066-2b6f-4a5b-af6d-c3d21d16fc00.description: This theme adds extra theming and an icon to the main toolbar of any private browsing window.
58649066-2b6f-4a5b-af6d-c3d21d16fc00.author: danm36

d93e67f8-e5e1-401e-9b82-f9d5bab231e6.name: Super Url Bar
d93e67f8-e5e1-401e-9b82-f9d5bab231e6.description: Get simple rounded edges, centered text, a removed border for your url bar and a background blur.
d93e67f8-e5e1-401e-9b82-f9d5bab231e6.author: JLBlk

dd4f5461-1564-4e56-9f9d-f81e3c18f93c.name: Zen Sidebar At Right Side
dd4f5461-1564-4e56-9f9d-f81e3c18f93c.description: Pin or float the Zen Sidebar at the right side.
dd4f5461-1564-4e56-9f9d-f81e3c18f93c.author: AntonioSTM

64cdc40f-2366-4b5b-8bad-d0524682595e.name: Allow Toolbar Theming
64cdc40f-2366-4b5b-8bad-d0524682595e.description: This allows you to use Firefox themes to customize your toolbar
64cdc40f-2366-4b5b-8bad-d0524682595e.author: ch4og

87196c08-8ca1-4848-b13b-7ea41ee830e7.name: Tab Preview Enhanced
87196c08-8ca1-4848-b13b-7ea41ee830e7.description: Enhanced tab preview, respecting user background color and padding
87196c08-8ca1-4848-b13b-7ea41ee830e7.author: Kaedriz
